CustomField.formula: IF(Text(Reference_Relationship__c)="Primary Manager","MANP", IF(Text(Reference_Relationship__c)="Secondary Manager","MANS", IF(Text(Reference_Relationship__c)="Secondary Manager / Senior Executive","MANS", IF(Text(Reference_Relationship__c)="Peer","PEER", IF(Text(Reference_Relationship__c)="Peer / Horizontal Stakeholder","PEER", IF(Text(Reference_Relationship__c)="Direct Report","SUB", IF(Text(Reference_Relationship__c)="Board Member","DIR", IF(Text(Reference_Relationship__c)="External","ZEXT"," "))))))))
CustomField.label: Reference Relationship Conga
